name: Dino's Bizarre Adventure
description:
Tips：It's best to turn off the browser mouse gesture

Player：

           Movement:WASD/↑←↓→

           Dash：The direction key + The right mouse button

Fire：

           Left mouse button（Long press）：

                 1.(Click)Burning plants Or restores health when positon overlaps

                 2.(Double click)   development

        All of the above activities of fire consume energy

        Gold coins will restore fire's energy
